item.title: Meta股价在法兰克福上涨，因业绩与资本计划
item.description: 周四法兰克福早盘交易中，Meta股价上涨近7%，此前多家券商上调了目标股价。这家Instagram母公司公布的财报显示，其第一季度营收预期高于华尔街预期。【原文：Meta shares rose almost 7% in early Frankfurt trading on Thursday, after several brokers raised their target prices following results in which the Instagram owner forecast first-quarter revenue above Wall Street expectations.】

item.title: 微软股价在法兰克福下跌6%，此前公布财报
item.description: 微软股价周四在法兰克福下跌6.2%，此前该公司表示上季度在人工智能领域的支出创下历史新高，且云计算业务增长放缓，令投资者感到担忧。【原文：Microsoft shares dropped 6.2% in Frankfurt on Thursday a day after the company said it had spent a record amount on artificial intelligence in the last quarter and posted slower cloud-computing growth, worrying investors.】

item.title: 贝恩公司称中国奢侈品市场预计2026年将反弹
item.description: 咨询公司贝恩公司周四表示，中国个人奢侈品市场预计将在2026年恢复温和增长，但警告称复苏将较为脆弱，且不同品牌和品类间的复苏态势将参差不齐。【原文：China's personal luxury goods market is expected to return to modest growth in 2026, consultancy Bain & Company said on Thursday, but warned the recovery would be fragile and uneven across brands and categories.】

item.title: 俄罗斯卢克石油公司将向美国凯雷集团出售国际资产
item.description: 俄罗斯第二大石油生产商卢克石油公司周四表示，已同意将其大部分海外资产出售给美国私募股权公司凯雷集团，交易总额约220亿美元，目前正等待美国政府批准。【原文：Russia's No. 2 oil producer Lukoil said on Thursday it had agreed to sell most of its foreign assets worth a total of around $22 billion to U.S. private equity firm Carlyle Group pending approval from the U.S. government.】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，阿里巴巴将与中国的泽洛斯合并，共同打造价值20亿美元的无人驾驶汽车业务。
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周四援引知情人士报道，阿里巴巴旗下物流部门计划将其自动驾驶业务菜鸟与中国的泽洛斯科技合并，组建估值约20亿美元的新实体。【原文：Alibaba's logistics arm plans to merge its autonomous-driving unit Cainiao with China's Zelos Technology, forming a new entity valued at approximately $2 billion, the Wall Street Journal reported on Thursday, citing sources familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 赛诺菲2026年销售额目标定为高个位数增长，并计划实施股票回购
item.description: 法国制药商赛诺菲周四表示，预计2026年销售额将实现高个位数百分比增长，这主要得益于其重磅哮喘药物Dupixent以及部分新药的强劲需求。【原文：French drugmaker Sanofi said on Thursday it expects sales to grow by a high-single-digit percentage in 2026, banking on strong demand for its blockbuster asthma drug Dupixent and some newer medicines.】

item.title: 印度纺织品出口商在遭受美国关税打击后，将希望寄托于欧盟协议
item.description: 印度纺织品和服装出口商因8月下旬美国加征50%关税而遭受重创，正寄望于本周与欧盟达成的贸易协议来抵消部分损失，同时敦促新德里尽快与华盛顿达成协议。【原文：India’s textile and apparel exporters, hit by 50% U.S. tariffs imposed late in August, are banking on this week's trade agreement with the European Union to offset part of the damage, while urging New Delhi to secure a quick deal with Washington.】

item.title: ABB对2026年前景充满信心，启动20亿美元股票回购计划
item.description: ABB周四表示，对2026年充满信心。该公司公布的第四季度业绩略高于预期，并启动了20亿美元的新股回购计划。【原文：ABB on Thursday said it was feeling confident about 2026 as it reported fourth quarter earnings slightly ahead of forecasts and launched a new $2 billion share buyback.】

item.title: 英伟达首席执行官表示，中国仍在为H200处理器完成许可证审批。
item.description: 英伟达首席执行官黄仁勋周四表示，他希望中国允许这家美国科技巨头在该国销售其强大的H200人工智能芯片，目前相关许可正在最终敲定中。【原文：Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang said on Thursday he hopes China will allow the U.S. technology giant to sell its powerful H200 artificial intelligence chip in the country and that the licence is being finalised.】

item.title: 中国誓言发展太空旅游、探索深空，与美国展开竞赛
item.description: 中国主要航天承包商承诺将在未来五年内发展太空旅游业，中国官方媒体周四报道称。在与美国的科技竞赛中，北京正加速推进其商业航天和深空探索计划。【原文：China's main space contractor vowed to develop space tourism in the next five years, state media reported on Thursday, as Beijing revs up its commercial spaceflight and deep space exploration ambitions amid a technology race with the U.S.】

item.title: 晨间竞标：开发人工智能确实成本高昂，但愿物有所值。
item.description: 韦恩·科尔为您解析欧洲及全球市场今日展望。【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Wayne Cole.】

item.title: SAP第四季度营收符合预期，云服务需求持续强劲
item.description: SAP周四公布的第四季度营收符合市场预期，其云软件及服务需求表现强劲，表明尽管全球经济降温，企业支出仍保持稳定。【原文：SAP on Thursday reported fourth-quarter revenue that met market estimates, as resilient demand for its cloud software and services suggested enterprise spending held up despite a cooling global economy.】

item.title: 现代汽车第四季度利润降幅超预期，美国关税影响显现
item.description: 现代汽车周四公布的数据显示，其第四季度营业利润较上年同期下滑40%，远低于分析师预期。美国关税抵消了韩元贬值带来的积极影响。【原文：Hyundai Motor on Thursday reported a 40% fall in fourth-quarter operating profit versus a year earlier, missing analysts' estimates by a big margin, as U.S. tariffs offset the positive impact of a weaker South Korean currency.】

item.title: 美泰公司推出新系列人偶，为《大力水手》电影造势
item.description: 美泰公司周四推出全新系列动作人偶，为即将上映的真人电影《宇宙大师》造势，力求复制其2023年爆款《芭比》的成功。【原文：Mattel launched a new line of action figures on Thursday for its upcoming live-action movie "Masters of the Universe", aiming to repeat the success of its 2023 smash hit "Barbie".】

item.title: 洞察：激进投资者如何将丰田收购案变成战场
item.description: 丰田计划将旗下子公司私有化，起初看似平淡无奇。然而，对丰田工业公司（TICO）的收购要约却点燃了一场激战：激进投资者要求最高报价，而日本企业文化则更重视利益相关者的和谐而非股东回报。【原文：Toyota's plan to take an affiliate private looked unremarkable at first. Instead, the bid for Toyota Industries, or TICO, ignited a battle between activist investors demanding top dollar and a Japanese corporate culture that prizes stakeholder harmony over shareholder returns.】

item.title: 丰田2025年以创纪录销量蝉联全球汽车销量冠军
item.description: 丰田汽车公司周四宣布，2025年全球销量创纪录达1130万辆，连续第六年蝉联全球销量冠军。【原文：Toyota Motor sold a record 11.3 million vehicles globally in 2025, the company said on Thursday, retaining its crown as the world's top-selling automaker for a sixth consecutive year.】

item.title: 铜价创纪录新高，地缘政治风险与美元疲软双重推动
item.description: 周四铜价上涨创下纪录高位，作为金属价格普遍上涨的一部分，这得益于地缘政治风险和美元疲软背景下投资者对实物资产的追捧。【原文：Copper advanced to set a record on Thursday, as part of a broad metals rally, supported by investors' appetite for physical assets amid geopolitical risks and a weak dollar.】

item.title: 印尼股市暴跌，评级下调风险引发抛售潮
item.description: 印尼股市周四正朝着自1998年亚洲金融危机以来最严重的两日跌幅迈进，因面临降级为前沿市场的风险，这进一步动摇了本已脆弱的投资者信心，引发了抛售潮。【原文：Indonesian stocks headed on Thursday for their steepest two-day slump since 1998 during the Asian financial crisis, as the risk of a downgrade to frontier market status rattled already fragile investor confidence and triggered a rush for the exits.】

item.title: 投资者惩罚大型科技公司人工智能支出，该支出导致增长放缓
item.description: 投资者本周对科技巨头财报的反应发出严正警告：他们会原谅那些带来稳健增长的创纪录支出，但若未能实现增长则会惩罚企业，这凸显出自ChatGPT三年前问世以来，市场格局已发生何等巨变。【原文：Investors responded to Big Tech earnings this week with a stark warning: they will forgive record spending that brings solid growth, but punish companies if not, showing how much the stakes have changed since ChatGPT's launch more than three years ago.】

item.title: 据《信息》报道，英伟达、微软和亚马逊正商讨向OpenAI投资高达600亿美元。
item.description: 《信息报》周三报道称，英伟达、亚马逊和微软正商讨向OpenAI投资高达600亿美元。【原文：Nvidia , Amazon , and Microsoft ​are in talks to invest up to $60 billion ‌in OpenAI, The Information reported on Wednesday.】

item.title: 特斯拉计划斥资200亿美元进行大规模资本支出，推动汽车技术超越人力驾驶阶段
item.description: 特斯拉计划将资本支出增加一倍以上，达到创纪录的200多亿美元——但其中很少部分将用于其传统业务，即向人类驾驶者销售电动汽车。【原文：Tesla plans to more than double capital spending to a record high of more than $20 billion this year - but little of it will go to its traditional business of selling electric vehicles to human drivers.】

item.title: 油价连续第三日上涨，因市场对伊朗遭袭的担忧加剧
item.description: 周四油价连续第三日上涨，因市场日益担忧美国可能对中东主要产油国伊朗发动军事打击，这可能导致该地区石油供应中断。【原文：Oil prices rose for a third day on Thursday on increasing concerns the U.S. may carry out a military attack on key Middle Eastern producer Iran that could disrupt supply from the region.】

item.title: 据彭博社报道，Ethos Technologies公司美国IPO定价为每股19美元。
item.description: 保险平台Ethos Technologies将其美国首次公开募股定价为每股19美元，彭博新闻周三援引知情人士消息报道。【原文：Insurance platform ​Ethos Technologies priced its U.S. ‌initial public offering at $19 per share, Bloomberg News reported on Wednesday, citing a person familiar with ‌the matter.】

item.title: 亚洲科技股涨势暂歇，黄金持续攀升
item.description: 亚洲股市周四暂歇涨势，科技板块财报喜忧参半引发投资者谨慎情绪，苹果公司财报发布在即。尽管美欧官员口头支持美元，但美元汇率仍显疲软。【原文：Asia's runaway stock markets took a breather on Thursday as mixed earnings out of the tech sector ​stirred caution ahead of Apple's results, while the dollar looked shaky despite verbal support from both U.S. and European officials.】

item.title: 美元重挫，因市场担忧风险不断累积
item.description: 周四美元汇率持续承压，此前美元遭遇重挫，尽管白宫和欧洲官员发表了支持性言论，但美国经济政策和地缘政治动向的不确定性仅部分抵消了负面影响。【原文：The dollar remained on shaky ground on Thursday, as uncertainty ​over U.S. economic policies and geopolitical moves were only partially offset by supportive comments from the White House ‌and European officials following a rout in the currency.】

item.title: 据《The Information》报道，由Thoma Bravo支持的Anaplan正准备提交保密性IPO申请文件。
item.description: 美国软件制造商Anaplan可能在未来几周内秘密提交首次公开募股申请。据《The Information》周三报道，这距离私募股权公司Thoma Bravo以104亿美元交易将该公司私有化已近四年。【原文：U.S. software ​maker Anaplan could file confidentially ‌for an initial public offering in the coming weeks, nearly four years after private equity firm Thoma Bravo took ‌the company private in a $10.4 billion ​deal, The Information reported on Wednesday.】

item.title: 消息人士称，私募股权公司奥达克斯正为BlueCat Networks寻求超过15亿美元的融资。
item.description: 据知情人士透露，奥达克斯私募股权公司正考虑出售网络安全服务商BlueCat Networks，该交易可能价值超过15亿美元。【原文：Audax Private Equity is exploring a sale of cybersecurity provider BlueCat Networks, which could fetch more than $1.5 billion, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 默多克的新闻集团进军西部，推出《加州邮报》
item.description: 《加州邮报》本周正式创刊，这是鲁珀特·默多克旗下新闻集团出版的保守派日报，以纸质版和网络版形式发行，标志着《纽约邮报》向西海岸媒体版图的扩张。【原文：The California Post, a conservative daily tabloid published by Rupert Murdoch's News Corp in print and online, made its debut this week, marking the New York Post’s expansion into the West Coast media landscape.】

item.title: 彭博新闻报道，Bumble、Match、Panera Bread和CrunchBase遭遇网络攻击
item.description: 彭博社周三援引受影响公司发言人的消息报道称，Bumble、Match Group和CrunchBase遭遇了网络攻击。【原文：Bumble , Match Group , and CrunchBase were hit by cyberattacks, Bloomberg News reported on Wednesday, citing spokespersons of the impacted companies.】

item.title: 谷歌破坏大型住宅代理网络，使运营商使用的设备减少"数百万台"
item.description: 谷歌周三表示，已采取行动移除全球最大住宅代理网络之一IPIDEA的域名，旨在保护数百万消费者设备免遭网络犯罪分子和国家支持的黑客利用。【原文：Google said on Wednesday it has taken action to remove domains belonging to one of the largest residential proxy networks in the world, called IPIDEA, in an effort to protect millions of consumer devices from being exploited by cybercriminals and state-sponsored hackers.】
